00014 #ifndef ULIBASE_DGST_H
00015 #define ULIBASE_DGST_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/base/base.h>
00018 
00019 #include <openssl/evp.h>
00020 #include <openssl/hmac.h>
00021 
00022 #define U_MAX_HASH_SIZE                 256 /* Max size of any expected hash algorithms (oversized) */
00023 #define U_MAX_HASH_BLOCK_SIZE    64 /* Max size of blocks used - MD5 and SHA1 are both 64 bytes */
00024 
00025 #ifdef __cplusplus
00026 extern "C" {
00027 #endif
00028 
00048 extern U_EXPORT UHashType               u_hashType;                                                     /* What type of hash is this? */
00049 extern U_EXPORT EVP_PKEY*     u_pkey;                       /* private key to sign the digest */
00050 extern U_EXPORT EVP_MD_CTX              u_mdctx;                                                                /* Context for digest */
00051 extern U_EXPORT const EVP_MD* u_md;                                                                     /* Digest instance */
00052 extern U_EXPORT unsigned char   u_mdValue[U_MAX_HASH_SIZE];     /* Final output */
00053 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t                u_mdLen;                                                                /* Length of digest */
00054 
00055 extern U_EXPORT HMAC_CTX      u_hctx;                                                           /* Context for HMAC */
00056 extern U_EXPORT const char*     u_hmac_key;                                                     /* The loaded key */
00057 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t      u_hmac_keylen;                                            /* The loaded key length */
00058 
00059 extern U_EXPORT void u_dgst_algoritm(int alg);
00060 extern U_EXPORT void u_dgst_hexdump(unsigned char* buf);
00061 extern U_EXPORT int  u_dgst_get_algoritm(const char* alg);
00062 
00063 extern U_EXPORT void u_dgst_init(int alg, const char* key, uint32_t keylen);
00064 
00076 static inline void u_dgst_hash(unsigned char* data, uint32_t length)
00077 {
00078         U_INTERNAL_TRACE("u_dgst_hash(%.*s,%u)", length, data, length)
00079 
00080         if (u_hmac_keylen)
00081                 {
00082                 HMAC_Update(&u_hctx, data, length);
00083                 }
00084         else
00085                 {
00086                 (void) EVP_DigestUpdate(&u_mdctx, data, length);
00087                 }
00088 }
00089 
00101 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t u_dgst_finish(unsigned char* hash, int base64, int max_columns); /* Finish and get hash */
00102 
00103 extern U_EXPORT void u_dgst_reset(void); /* Reset the hash */
00104 
00105 /* The EVP signature routines are a high level interface to digital signatures
00106  */
00107 
00108 extern U_EXPORT void u_dgst_sign_init(int alg, ENGINE* impl);
00109 extern U_EXPORT void u_dgst_verify_init(int alg, ENGINE* impl);
00110 
00111 static inline void u_dgst_sign_hash(unsigned char* data, uint32_t length)
00112 {
00113         U_INTERNAL_TRACE("u_dgst_sign_hash(%.*s,%u)", length, data, length)
00114 
00115         (void) EVP_SignUpdate(&u_mdctx, data, length);
00116 }
00117 
00118 static inline void u_dgst_verify_hash(unsigned char* data, uint32_t length)
00119 {
00120         U_INTERNAL_TRACE("u_dgst_verify_hash(%.*s,%u)", length, data, length)
00121 
00122         (void) EVP_SignUpdate(&u_mdctx, data, length);
00123 }
00124 
00125 uint32_t u_dgst_sign_finish(unsigned char* sig, int base64, int max_columns); /* Finish and get signature */
00126 int             u_dgst_verify_finish(unsigned char* sigbuf, uint32_t siglen);
